metadata.name: Habitation #1
metadata.description:
The 2117 Space Pod is your first home away from home in the 2117 Metaverse. Each Citizen in the 2117 Metaverse will be able to access their very own Space Pod to begin their journey to Mars and beyond.

This is a dynamic collection that will be modified depending on our location on our Journey to Mars. But no matter if itâ€™s a Space Pod on a ship hurtling through space or a plush penthouse apartment on the first colony on Mars, your home will be a versatile and welcoming space you can call your own.
